name: Tactical Networking Against PSNs
description: Creating secure and strategic alliances to counteract PSN infiltration at local and organizational levels.

cards.title: Identifying and Vetting Safe Allies
cards.description: Ensuring that resistance efforts are not compromised by infiltrators.
bulletpoints: Using trust-based verification systems before full inclusion in networks.
Setting up layered security measures to detect infiltrators.
Employing behavioral analysis to detect PSN operatives in disguise.
cards.summaryText: Gatekeep new allies with multi-step vetting, layer surveillance to spot infiltrators early, and continuously scan behaviors for the tells that give PSNs away.

cards.title: Sealing Information Leaks in Resistance Groups
cards.description: Preventing PSNs from accessing and manipulating private networks.
bulletpoints: Utilizing compartmentalization to limit knowledge exposure.
Implementing misinformation traps to identify internal threats.
Training members in OPSEC to maintain secure communications.
cards.summaryText: Segment intel so no one person knows everything, lay false breadcrumbs to flush moles, and drill OPSEC habits until secure communication is second nature.

cards.title: Countering PSN Social Sabotage Strategies
cards.description: Identifying and neutralizing PSN efforts to divide and destabilize resistance movements.
bulletpoints: Preemptively addressing false accusations and smear tactics.
Reframing divisive issues to prevent internal fractures.
Redirecting PSN-instigated conflicts toward constructive unity-building.
cards.summaryText: Call out smear attempts before they stick, reframe polarizing issues into shared goals, and flip PSN-triggered conflicts into opportunities for tighter unity.
